SPIDER.queryLike:
SELECT ftel.task AS TASK_NAME, ftel.revision AS REVISION, fcel.java_class_error AS JAVA_CLASS_ERROR
FROM spider_bmd.full_task_error_list ftel
JOIN spider_bmd.full_compiler_error_list fcel ON ftel.java_class_error_id = fcel.id
WHERE ftel.task LIKE ? AND REVISION = ? AND JAVA_CLASS_ERROR = ?
ORDER BY TASK_NAME, REVISION, JAVA_CLASS_ERROR LIMIT ?
SPIDER.queryIs:
SELECT ftel.task AS TASK_NAME, ftel.revision AS REVISION, fcel.java_class_error AS JAVA_CLASS_ERROR
FROM spider_bmd.full_task_error_list ftel
JOIN spider_bmd.full_compiler_error_list fcel ON ftel.java_class_error_id = fcel.id
WHERE ftel.task = ? AND REVISION = ? AND JAVA_CLASS_ERROR = ?
ORDER BY TASK_NAME, REVISION, JAVA_CLASS_ERROR LIMIT ?

BIRT2010.queryLike:
SELECT s.testsuitename AS TASK_NAME, td.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.testresult TEST_RESULT,
tr.exitcode AS EXITCODE, s.analyzed AS ANALYZED, tr.starttime AS STARTTIME, tr.endtime AS ENDTIME, tr.failuredescription AS FAILUREDESCRIPTION
FROM ndsreport.test t
JOIN ndsreport.testsuite s ON s.id = t.testsuite_id JOIN ndsreport.testresult tr ON tr.id = t.testresult_id JOIN ndsreport.testdescription td ON td.id = t.testdescription_id
WHERE s.testsuitename LIKE ? AND td.name = ? /*AND tr.exitcode IS null*/
ORDER BY TASK_NAME, TEST_NAME LIMIT ?
BIRT2010.queryIs:
SELECT s.testsuitename AS TASK_NAME, td.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.testresult TEST_RESULT,
tr.exitcode AS EXITCODE, s.analyzed AS ANALYZED, tr.starttime AS STARTTIME, tr.endtime AS ENDTIME, tr.failuredescription AS FAILUREDESCRIPTION
FROM ndsreport.test t
JOIN ndsreport.testsuite s ON s.id = t.testsuite_id JOIN ndsreport.testresult tr ON tr.id = t.testresult_id JOIN ndsreport.testdescription td ON td.id = t.testdescription_id
WHERE s.testsuitename = ? AND td.name = ? /*AND tr.exitcode IS null*/
ORDER BY TASK_NAME, TEST_NAME LIMIT ?
BIRT2010.queryCheckGeneration: SELECT * FROM ndsreport.testsuite WHERE testsuitename LIKE ? LIMIT ?

BIRT2020.queryLike:
SELECT s.name AS TASK_NAME, t.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.result TEST_RESULT,
tr.exit_code AS EXITCODE, s.is_analyzed AS ANALYZED, tr.start_date_time AS STARTTIME, tr.end_date_time AS ENDTIME, tr.exception AS FAILUREDESCRIPTION
FROM ndsreport_new.tests_results tr
JOIN ndsreport_new.suites s ON s.id = tr.suite_id JOIN ndsreport_new.tests t ON t.id = tr.test_id
WHERE s.name LIKE ? AND t.name = ?
ORDER BY TASK_NAME, TEST_NAME LIMIT ?
BIRT2020.queryIs:
SELECT s.name AS TASK_NAME, t.name AS TEST_NAME, tr.result TEST_RESULT,
tr.exitcode AS EXITCODE, s.analyzed AS ANALYZED, tr.starttime AS STARTTIME, tr.endtime AS ENDTIME, tr.failuredescription AS FAILUREDESCRIPTION
FROM ndsreport_new.tests_results tr
JOIN ndsreport_new.suites s ON s.id = tr.suite_id JOIN ndsreport_new.tests t ON t.id = tr.test_id
WHERE s.name = ? AND t.name = ?
ORDER BY TASK_NAME, TEST_NAME LIMIT ?
BIRT2020.queryCheckGeneration: SELECT * FROM ndsreport_new.suites WHERE testsuitename LIKE ? LIMIT ?

BIRT_GENERATION_SELECTOR.g2010: SELECT * FROM ndsreport.testsuite WHERE testsuitename LIKE ? LIMIT ?
BIRT_GENERATION_SELECTOR.g2020: SELECT * FROM ndsreport_new.suites WHERE name LIKE ? LIMIT ?
